articles.title: "Love Has Won Over Hate": Seattle 1st US City To Ban Caste Discrimination - NDTV
articles.description: Seattle has become the first US city to outlaw caste discrimination after its local council passed a resolution, moved by an Indian-American politician and economist, to add caste to its non-discrimination policy.
articles.content:
The resolution to ban caste discrimination was moved by Kshama Sawant.

articles.title: Teck's mining breakup sets the scene for copper takeovers - MINING.COM - MINING.com
articles.description: Teck owns four copper mines in South America and Canada that produced 270,000 metric tons last year.
